record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 493

speaking.paragraph: I understand H.R. 493 is at the desk and is due for a second reading; is that correct?

record.chair: The clerk will read the bill for the second time.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings at this time, Mr. President.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
